item.title: Another dumb error! need help fixing it!
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

how about this:

                                          else if (npcs[ i ].npcType == 2261)
                     {
                                           if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
                                           {
                                                          npcs[ i ].updateRequired = true;
                                                          npcs[ i ].textUpdateRequired = true;
                                                          if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("J K"))
                                                          {
                                                                        npcs[ i ].textUpdate = "J K is ONLINE";
                                                          }
                                                          else if (!PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("J K"))
                                                          {
                                                                        npcs[ i ].textUpdate = "J K is OFFLINE";
                                                          }
                                                                                                                                           }
           }

there, now do you see??? if that doesnt work, add the dam periods, so like this:

                                          else if (npcs[ i ].npcType == 2261)
                     {
                                           if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
                                           {
                                                          npcs[ i ].updateRequired = true;
                                                          npcs[ i ].textUpdateRequired = true;
                                                          if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("J K"))
                                                          {
                                                                        npcs[ i ].text.Update = "J K is ONLINE";
                                                          }
                                                          else if (!PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("J K"))
                                                          {
                                                                        npcs[ i ].text.Update = "J K is OFFLINE";
                                                          }
                                                                                                                                           }
           }

i dont know, if both of those dont work, then you can suck my balls :), not you, its a figure of speech

lol bmx, i dont know if that would work

                     {

                                           {

item.title: Another dumb error! need help fixing it!
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Thanks for the last code u helped me with ‘zammy!!’ it did work, tyvm… if your still here take a look at this, or if anyone can help me, ill rlly apreciate it…

kk i was making npcs talk… look at this…

                                       else if (npcs[ i ].npcType == 2261)
                 {
                                       if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
                                       {
                                                      npcs[ i ].updateRequired = true;
                                                      npcs[ i ].textUpdateRequired = true;
                                                      if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("J K"))
                                                      {
                                                                    npcs[ i ].textUpdate = "J K is ONLINE";
                                                      }
                                                      else
                                                      {
                                                                    npcs[ i ].text.Update = "J K is OFFLINE";
                                                      }
                                                                                                                                       }
       }
       } else if (npcs[ i ].IsDead == true) {

I think that last part is part of the code but hey, im not the best coder so can someone correct me here? oh, lol i forgot to tell you the problem, when im online, it keeps saying " J K is OFFLINE " ive tried alot of things, just can’t get it to say im online when im online, and offline when im offline
